long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension makes organizing your audio downloads from Kabaloops a breeze! 🎧💨 No more scrambling to find your files—everything gets neatly categorized for you!

All your audio downloads will be automatically saved in the Audio folder 🎶, so your loops or beats and sound files are always easy to find and manage.

Any PDFs you download will head straight to the Licenses folder 📄, keeping important documents organized and ready when you need them.

Just download from Kabaloops, and let this extension do the heavy lifting. It’ll sort everything into the right folders with zero hassle! ✨📁
